title: Oracle Banking Digital Experience (OBDX) Implementation

title: FLEXCUBE Universal Banking System Integration
description: Integrated and customized Oracle FLEXCUBE Universal Banking (FCDB) system for core banking operations. Developed UI components, REST APIs, and SQL queries for banking workflows. Handled troubleshooting and system documentation. Technologies: Java, JavaScript, Spring Boot, SQL, MVC/MVVM Pattern. LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/dheerajkumarsihag/

title: Open Banking APIs & Digital Channels
